code:
%%{CloudNative_ServiceMesh}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [CloudNative_HelmChart] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
    Cancelled --> [CloudNative_K8sCluster]

    state Created {CloudNative_Serverless] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [CloudNative_DockerImage]
    }

    state InProgress {CloudNative_DockerImage] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [CloudNative_HelmChart]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {CloudNative_HelmChart] --> Blocked
        [CloudNative_HelmChart] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [CloudNative_HelmChart]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [CloudNative_Serverless]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {CloudNative_HelmChart] --> Done
        [CloudNative_Serverless] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [CloudNative_K8sCluster]
        PartiallyDone --> [CloudNative_HelmChart]
    }
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform
